title: Call Of The Wild and Selected Stories
description: Inspired by the rugged landscape of the wild Northwest frontier, Jack London's immortal "The Call of the Wild" has captivated readers of all ages with its unique perspective - a narrative from the viewpoint of a sled dog named Buck - and its theme of man's instinctive return to primitive behavior when pitted against the brute force of nature. Based on London's own adventures in the Great White North.Includes:- The Call of the Wild- Diable -- A Dog- An Odyssey of The North- To The Man On Trail- To Build A Fire- Love of Life
author: Jack  London
